mapper.insert: insert into personal_rank(rank_name, user_id, category_id, target_id) VALUES (#{rankName},#{userId},#{categoryId},#{targetId})

insert into rank_song(rank_id, song_id, ranking) VALUES
(#{item.rankId},#{item.songId},#{item.ranking})
mapper.select: select singer_id,singer_name from singer where category_id=#{categoryId} and singer_status=1
select song_id,song.song_name from song where singer_id=#{singerId} and song_status=1
select count(*) from vote_record where ip=#{ip} and rank_id=#{rankId}

select a.rank_id,a.rank_name,a.vote_count,a.publish_time,b.rs_id,b.rank_id, b.song_id,b.ranking,b.rank_create_time,c.song_name from (select rank_id, rank_name,vote_count,publish_time from personal_rank where category_id=#{categoryId} order by publish_time asc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}) a left join rank_song as b on a.rank_id=b.rank_id left join song as c on b.song_id = c.song_id order by b.ranking asc,b.rank_update_time asc
